name: SB Login
author: Fida Al Hasan

sections.description:
Sb login widget that allows a user to login, register, reset their password, see recent activity, time, post and comment count, author info, in one place. You can also customize wordpress mail from name and address.

Features

  • A login and registration widget for your blog
  • Tabs/links for logged out users include login, register, and ‘lost password’.
  • Captcha functionality included.
  • Logged in users can see their name, avatar, logged in date, and comments/posts since sign in.
  • User can see his/her recent viewed posts and recent comments made by him/her.
  • User can see his ID, First joined date, total number of his/her posts, total number of comments made by him/her, user level, posts feed, comments feed.
  • AJAX validation makes this thing run smooth
  • Shortcode & PHP Code if you don’t want to use widget
  • Options page for customizing the plugin
  • User can add extra link
  • This plugin is so light
  • Smart & nice looking. You love it.
  • Nice warning & success system.
  • You can translate this plugin.

Translations

Available translations are listed in the plugin’s admin page

If you have made a translation file please send it to this mail

Why dont you rate the plugin if you like it !! ðŸ™‚

Our team Web Care Zone.
sections.installation:
Automatic

  • In the admin panel plugins page click Add New
  • Search for SB Login
  • Find SB Login in the list an click Install Now
  • Click OK when prompted
  • Enjoy!

Manual

  • Extract sb-login.zip to your wp-content/plugins directory.
  • In the admin panel under plugins activate SB Login.
  • Enjoy!
sections.faq: You will find the F.A.Q.s in the admin page.
sections.changelog:
2.5

  • New “Info” Tab added
  • Login time bug fixed
  • Plugin’s look now more smart & attractive
  • WordPress Email From name and address now can be changed from the plugin
  • Settings for showing Captcha in login and registration tab
  • Add new link option updated
  • User can now see their ID, First join date, Total posts number, total comments number, user level, author feed, comments feed.
  • Translation problem solved.
  • Lost password form freezing problem solved.
  • Other bugs fixed.

2.0

  • How to use, Settings, Server Information pages added
  • Shortcode & PHP code added
  • Security bug fixed
  • Log in validity fixed
  • French, German, Persian, Russian translation added.

1.3

  • jQuery blockUI plugin version upgraded to 2.64.0

1.2

  • Italian translation added, added plural translation in translated files

1.1

  • Bug fix

1.0

  • First Release
